remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅[deque:: swap (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/deque-swap-stl-clr)。For more information, see [deque::swap (STL/CLR)](/cpp/dotnet/deque-swap-stl-clr).
